name: portal game
description:
You are Blob, and you hate living in the world you are, all pixelated, all "buggy", So with your portal gun you want to collect "portal pumpkins" to travel to a better world.

Be careful, as your world tries to impede you from escaping, it will "bug" you, be careful.

Controls:

Move - Space

Shoot - Mouse

If you keep pressing space next to a wall, you'll grab from it (it will be helpful if you know when to use it)
